snippet.title: Revelatio - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
"Revelatio" is a turn-based strategy game that combines tile-based combat and elements of roguelike. Strategically summon and control units to claim victory. Stain the world with your darkness by corrupting various units, bosses and even NPCs. 

Revelatio will be available on Steam in 2024.

Directed By:
KIM TAEYOON

Game Art:
PARK MINSEO
AN JIHEE
JO SUHYEON

Game UI:
LEE JIMIN

Game Sound:
KIM JUHYE

Game Design:
PARK JOONYUNG
YANG HYUNJIN

Game Dev:
KO JEAHYUN
NOH JUNYEONG
NOH HYEONGMIN
RYU HAEWON

Special Thanks To:
YEO KIWON
YOON HEEKYEONG
HONG JUNGWOO
